title: Property appraisals and valuations
dataVerified: Appraiser name, property owner, address, valuation details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Appraisal status (current/valid). Link to certified appraiser system (owner and lenders, requires authentication)
rationale: Domain binding verifies certified appraiser. Formal reports suitable for OCR. Prevents inflated valuations. Financing and tax documentation.
